Published October 29 2014

"Band," "Watch," and "Wear"

"Band," "Watch," and "Wear" — Microsoft joins Apple and Google in the wearables game. The MS Band resembles the Fitbit Force, but with a nicer screen. Accompanying app looks decent.

Enjoy your day.
